title: Announcing the Ocean Week contest winners!

replies.body: Hey Riot! So happy to see all my good mates that made it through! Also just wanting to add, with Kydrasaur/Genderbent Ziggs, I was the Genderbent Jinx in the photo :-3 thanks again for choosing us!
You look good o/
Thanks Heaps Alice! We really did try. All of us :3

It is a very good Cross Gender Cosplay Tbh.
{{champion:222}}
damn that MF tho
I was the jinx in the ekko and jinx rushing baron picture a big big big thanks for every one who voted for us ❤️❤️{{champion:222}}
Loved your Jinx! I was the Genderbent one :3

that last one on the cosplay list is aboslutely GARBAGE. Is that a gender swapped POOL PARTY HEIMERDINGER? Where do you even get that idea? And don't get me started on that varus. Some skinny guy put on some shorts, grabbed a wig and a toy boy and now hes apparently cosplaying. That is just utter trash and shouldn't be featured at all.
Banana boat = product placement? o-o
Congratz to all the Artists and the Cosplayers that were in the top ten, and by looking at all of the pieces of Fan Art i know you guys deserved the top ten
{{champion:202}}
{{champion:119}}

All the entries look amazingg, but some of them had nothing to do with the contest theme. 'You must either: depict at least one champion battling or defending Oceania during Ocean Week OR visually represent the Oceanic League of Legends community.' smh
didn't get free champ
{{champion:119}}
So good
when u realize the guy has a nerf rebel bow
Is that... Luffy?
Ahh thank you for placing my drawing "fun in the sun" ! <3{{champion:131}} {{champion:89}}
how to get reward?
{{champion:105}}
My favourite cosplay is the last one
aw thankyou x
{{champion:86}}
Great work cosplayers and artists.
plz fix the update i have infinte files
congrats! glad to see the one i voted for won grand prize :P
Wow, I was not expecting so much crappy art to get the most votes.
